summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of East 53rd Street and East 53rd Street Produced, from 27th Avenue Northeast to 30th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7395 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
